document_data.name: Blood Hawk
document_data.mainbody: '''Blood hawks''' were a species of deadly predatory bird.
document_data.Description: Blood hawks were about the same size as a regular [[hawk]] with a large wingspan. They had speckled grey feathers. Their beaks and talons were strong and extremely sharp.
document_data.Behavior: Male blood hawks hunted in groups called murders. Blood hawks were more vicious than other birds-of-prey. They possessed an insatiable desire for fresh blood. They were known to attack a target merely for the pleasure they gained from killing.
document_data.Combat: Blood hawks were very deadly opponents. They were very fast and maneuverable. They were stubborn fighters, continuing to attack a target even if they suffered injuries.
document_data.History: Evil [[bird maiden]]s in [[Zakhara]] were known to shapeshift into blood hawks.{{Cite dragon/218/The Ecology of the Bird Maiden|76-80,94}}

Ecology.Diets: Blood hawks were obligate carnivores and hunted [[humanoid]]s, particularly [[human]]s. They got their name from their habit of consuming as much fresh blood as possible.
Ecology.Habitats:
Outside of [[Faerun]], blood hawks were known to be encountered in various deserts in [[Maztica]].

Beyond the [[Prime Material plane]], blood hawks could be found in the [[plane]] of [[Acheron]].
